content.p: New Term, New Language and New Opportunities! The Nottingham Confucius Institute is offering a range of courses for UoN staff, students and general public. Mandarin is becoming an increasingly useful language around the world. It can open new vistas for you: whether you are engaged in business, education, travelling or just making friends. The Nottingham Confucius Institute offers daytime/evening and weekend classes as well as private lessons, all taught by experienced language teachers from Chinese universities. Join us from the week commencing Monday 30 September 2024. Register or find out more Room A23, CI Library Si Yuan Building Jubilee Campus Nottingham, NG8 1BB telephone: +44 (0)115 748 4502 fax: +44 (0)115 846 6324 email: confucius.institute@nottingham.ac.uk
